main.name: Drishti Peshwani
main.bio: I am a second year Mechanical Engineering student at IIT Madras, currently the best educational institute. I have a great zeal for programming and I am always excited for solving challenges and working on real-world problems. I am skilled with C++, Python and Javascript and have worked with various tech frameworks. I am a self-dedicated person and always excited to learn and explore new things. Apart from this I love to dance and read books , they are a great tool for refreshing my mind.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: CuriousJr is an Ed-Tech mobile application to teach coding to kids. Worked with Blockly.js which is a javascript library to build visual programming editors to teach coding in an interactive manner.

work.title: Head - Web Operations
work.description: Leading a team of 10 developers. Spearheading frontend development of a PWA for Shaastra which will be used by around 10000+ users.

work.title: Developer
work.description: Working on a social networking application which can be used as a common platform for our college students to communicate and connect with each other. Worked with Angular + Ionic Framework along with Firebase as a backend framework.

work.title: Open Source Contributor
work.description: One of the open source contributors to get selected out of 6000+ applicants. Worked on various issues like improvement of UI , implementing authentication for various open source projects as a part of this program over the period of 3 months.

testimonials.text: Drishti is very hardworking and dedicated person.She is always motivated to learn new things and help others
